name: deleteAnnotation
description: Deletes a single Annotation matching the provided ID.

workspace.description: This can either be the workspace ID (slug) or the workspace UUID surrounded by curly-braces, for example `{workspace UUID}`.

commit.description: The commit the annotation belongs to.

reportId.description: Either the uuid or external-id of the annotation.

annotationId.description: Either the uuid or external-id of the annotation.
